secText:
Lesson:
1. Explore two-dimensional motion by [OBJ:actsec_c451zs:driving a car in two dimensions].
2. Write [OBJ:expsec_d455:vectors in rectangular form].
3. [OBJ:expsec_d454:Describe two-dimensional displacement] using vectors.
4. [OBJ:actsec_ka51:Explore displacement vectors] using spaceships.
5. Determine the components of [OBJ:expsec_d466:velocity vectors] and write velocity vectors in rectangular form.
6. Determine how velocity vector components change when a [OBJ:expsec_d466222:car moves around a curve].
7. [OBJ:actsec_c451225:Compare velocity vector components] while driving a car in two-dimensions.
8. [OBJ:expsec_d459:Compare speed and velocity] while a car moves in uniform circular motion.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37428:Describe] a velocity vector in rectangular notation.
2. [OBJ:qc_37435:Describe] the average velocity in rectangular notation.
